dumpObj.title: Instance of class 'class' as defined in module 'ClipSlot'
dumpObj.documentation: This class represents an entry in Lives Session view matrix.

method.name: fire
method.doc:
fire( (ClipSlot)arg1) -> None : Fire a Clip if this Clipslot owns one, else trigger the stop button, if we have one.
C++ signature : void fire(TPyHandle<AGroupAndClipSlotBase>)

method.name: set_fire_button_state
method.doc:
set_fire_button_state( (ClipSlot)arg1, (bool)arg2) -> None : Set the clipslot's fire button state directly. Supports all launch modes.
C++ signature : void set_fire_button_state(TPyHandle<AGroupAndClipSlotBase>,bool)

method.name: stop
method.doc:
stop( (ClipSlot)arg1) -> None : Stop playing the contained Clip, if there is a Clip and its currently playing.
C++ signature : void stop(TPyHandle<AGroupAndClipSlotBase>)

attribute.name: canonical_parent
attribute.type: Get the canonical parent of the ClipSlot.

attribute.name: clip
attribute.type: Returns the Clip which this clipslots currently owns. Might be None.

attribute.name: controls_other_clips
attribute.type: Returns true if firing this slot will fire clips in other slots. Can only be true for slots in group tracks.

attribute.name: has_clip
attribute.type: Returns true if this Clipslot owns a Clip.

attribute.name: has_stop_button
attribute.type: Get/Set if this Clip has a stop button, which will, if fired, stop any other Clip that is currently playing the Track we do belong to.

attribute.name: is_playing
attribute.type: Returns whether the clip associated with the slot is playing.

attribute.name: is_recording
attribute.type: Returns whether the clip associated with the slot is recording.

attribute.name: is_triggered
attribute.type: Const access to the triggering state of the clip slot.

attribute.name: playing_status
attribute.type: Const access to the playing state of the clip slot. Can be either stopped, playing, or recording.

attribute.name: will_record_on_start
attribute.type: returns true if the clip slot will record on being fired.
